lw3dge.graphics

Class MasterRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • lw3dge.graphics.MasterRenderer

  • public class MasterRenderer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to track all in-game objects to be rendered to the screen. The render queues must be rebuilt every frame.
    Author:
    Jared Massa

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MasterRenderer()
      Creates a new initialized MasterRenderer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cleanUp() 
      void processEntity(GraphicalEntity entity)
      Adds the specified entity into the entity list for rendering this frame.
      void processLight(Light light)
      Adds a light into the render queue.
      void render()
      Renders all elements known to the MasterRenderer and then clears the render queues.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MasterRenderer

        public MasterRenderer()
        Creates a new initialized MasterRenderer. Must be called after GL.createCapabilities() is called, during an active OpenGL context.
        See Also:
        Display.init()

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render()
        Renders all elements known to the MasterRenderer and then clears the render queues.

      • processEntity

        public void processEntity(GraphicalEntity entity)
        Adds the specified entity into the entity list for rendering this frame. Entities stored in each frame are stored in a hash map using the texture as a key.
        Parameters:
        entity - the GraphicalEntity to be rendered

      • processLight

        public void processLight(Light light)
        Adds a light into the render queue.
        Parameters:
        light - the Light object to render

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp()
